##HW05
###**B04208025/地理三/林芳偉**

###2.
```{r}
library(rgdal)
library(sp)
library(GISTools)
Popn.TWN <- readOGR(dsn = "Lyr", layer = "Popn_TWN", encoding="Big5")

max_x <- c()
min_x <- c()
max_y <- c()
min_y <- c()

for(i in 1:368) {
  poly <- Popn.TWN@polygons[[i]]@Polygons[[1]]@coords
  max_x[i] <- max(poly[,1])
  min_x[i] <- min(poly[,1])
  max_y[i] <- max(poly[,2])
  min_y[i] <- min(poly[,2])
}

cat("most.eastern.point：", min(min_x), "\n", "most.western.point：", max(max_x), "\n", "most.southern.point：", min(min_y), "\n", "most.northern.point：", max(min_y), "\n")

A <- bbox(Popn.TWN)

cat("most.eastern.point：", min(A[1,1]), "\n", "most.western.point：", max(A[1,2]), "\n", "most.southern.point：", min(A[2,1]), "\n", "most.northern.point：", max(A[2,2]), "\n")
```
